amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to increase and decrease funding for the Grid Deployment account by $150 million to emphasize the need to address domestic shortages of large power transformers and distribution transformers through authorities within the Defense Production Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Houlahan amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
